footer.description: The premier marketplace for n8n workflow automation. Discover ready-to-use workflows or sell your own workflows to the automation community.

hero.title: The Ultimate
hero.subtitle: Automation Hub
hero.description: Where n8n, Make, Airtable, and Zapier workflows come together. Discover, share, and monetize your automation creations in one unified marketplace.

features.title: Why Creators Choose Us
features.subtitle: A sanctuary for automation artisans where creativity meets functionality in perfect harmony.

security.title: Fortress Security
security.description: Your creations are protected by military-grade encryption and our guardian community of verified artisans.

prosperity.title: Instant Prosperity
prosperity.description: Transform your passion into profit with our enchanted marketplace that turns workflows into wealth.

deploy.title: Lightning Deploy
deploy.description: Watch your workflows come alive instantly with our magical one-click deployment spells.

quality.title: Artisan Quality
quality.description: Every workflow is blessed by our council of automation wizards before joining the gallery.

community.title: Sacred Circle
community.description: Join our mystical community of creators where knowledge flows freely and dreams take flight.

support.title: Divine Support
support.description: Our celestial support team guides you through every step of your automation journey.

cta.title: Ready to Create Magic?
cta.description: Step into a world where your automation dreams become reality. Join thousands of creators who've already discovered the magic of Neaply.

becomeSeller.title: Become a Seller on Neaply

grow.title: Grow Your Audience
